entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
